message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.CL 

This paper deals with action recognition in videos using semantic word vector space as the common space to embed videos and category labels. This involves mapping between the semantic space and space-time features of videos containing complex actions, which is a challenging task. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves machine learning techniques such as self-training and data augmentation, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the use of semantic word vector space implies that the paper could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.CL (Computation and Language). Finally, since the paper deals with video data, it could also belong to cs.MM (Multimedia).
